rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for communal dining; features large windows and high ceilings. Optimized placement to encourage social interaction while adhering to traditional layout norms.

rooms.name: Kitchen

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite featuring a private balcony and ensuite bathroom. Placed in the southwest quadrant for restful energies; includes colonial decorative elements and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed with colonial accents, positioned to maintain privacy while ensuring good energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace integrated into the living space yet offering seclusion; optimized for natural light from east-facing windows to boost productivity in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
